text:
请记得在您选择的时间前来提货时带上自备购物袋哦！ 对于新鲜和冷冻商品，若未按时提货，订单将不予退款。 让我们一起努力，避免浪费减少碳排量，为绿色的未来而努力。
您的订单信息：
订单号：[redacted_info]
下单时间：18-10-2024 09:59:19
提货时间与地址： 20-10-2024 13:00-17:00
[redacted_info]
trans:
Please be sure to bring your shopping bag when you come to take your delivery at the chosen time! For fresh and frozen items, orders will not be refunded if not being picked up on time. Let's work together to avoid waste and reduce carbon emissions for a greener future.
Your order:
Order Number: [redacted_info]
Time of Ordering: 18-10-2024 09:59:19
Pick-up Time and Address: 20-10-2024 13:00-17:00
[redacted_info]
